alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:54PM CDT until June 14 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Johnson County in western Arkansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pettigrew, or 17 miles south of Huntsville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walnut... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Salus... Catalpa... Friley... Ozone... Fallsville... Swain... Oark... Dixon Ridge... Nail... Arbaugh... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
